roleset.name: produce a new master recorder to improve quality
roleset.note: REMASTER-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from remaster.01-v)
REMASTERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, remaster.01. No VNcls. (from remastering.01-n)

example.text: It would be far more appealing to see [those films]-1 fully remastered *T*-1 in IMAX , rather than a tacky bandwagon jump , and it would still rake in money .
example.arg: rather than a tacky bandwagon jump

example.name: ADJ
example.text: On the subject of Star Wars , as a massive fan since I was a child this saddens me as I would like the films to be left as they are . -LRB- Saying that I do agreed with the remastering they did for the 20th anniversary ... -RRB-
example.arg: that they did for the 20th anniversary

example.name: both args
example.text: Malick must certainly like and trust Criterion, since he's approved their remastering of his first three films.
